XenotypeDef.label: ghoul
XenotypeDef.description: A human twisted by prolonged exposure to toxic radiation. Their rotting flesh is a testament to their transformation, yet they persist - immune to toxins and healed by them. Some say they're already dead, just too stubborn to stop walking.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Radiation-mutated humans with rotting flesh who are healed by toxins.

XenotypeDef.label: ghoul
XenotypeDef.description: A ghoul whose mind has deteriorated beyond recognition. Driven by primal instincts, they are prone to sudden violent outbursts when their ferality overtakes them. Their rotting flesh heals through toxins, but their humanity is all but lost.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Ghouls with deteriorating minds prone to violent episodes.

XenotypeDef.label: glowing one
XenotypeDef.description: A rare and dangerous ghoul variant that emits constant radiation. Their bodies glow with an eerie green light as they damage nearby non-ghouls while healing other ghouls with their radioactive aura.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Rare radioactive ghouls that emit deadly radiation.

XenotypeDef.label: glowing one
XenotypeDef.description: A feral glowing ghoul whose mind has deteriorated while their radioactive body continues to emit deadly radiation. Driven by primal instincts and prone to violent outbursts, they are among the most dangerous ghouls in the wasteland.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Feral radioactive ghouls with deteriorating minds.
